history.proof: intros d a t H. inversion H; subst. apply rec_dta with ladj. - shelve. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t

Premises:
dta_non_empty_states = fun d : preDTA => power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
preDTA_kill = fix preDTA_kill (m : Map bool) (d : preDTA) {struct d} : preDTA := match d with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a s => match states_kill m s with | Some s' => M1 state a s' | None => M0 state end | @M2 _ d0 d1 => match preDTA_kill m d0 with | @M0 _ => match preDTA_kill m d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a s' => M1 state (N.succ_double a) s' | @M2 _ m0 m1 => M2 state (M0 state) (M2 state m0 m1) end | @M1 _ a s' => let d0' := M1 state a s' in match preDTA_kill m d1 with | @M0 _ => M1 state (N.double a) s' |
dt_kill_empty_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), term_high t <= n -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
dt_non_empty_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> forall n : nat, term_high t <= n -> MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true
dt_non_empty_d : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true
dt_non_empty_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true < -> (exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t)
dt_kill_empty_d_1 : forall (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (tl : term_list), dt_kill_empty_def_0 n -> term_high_0 tl <= n -> liste_reconnait d p tl -> exists p' : prec_list, prec_list_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) p = Some p' /\ liste_reconnait (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) p' tl
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
dt_non_empty_def_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
dt_non_empty_r : forall (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true -> exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t
dt_non_empty_r_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true -> exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
dt_non_empty_lazy_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states_lazy d) a = Some true < -> (exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t)
dt_non_empty_fix_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true -> MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true
dt_non_empty_fix_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true
dt_non_empty_fix_0 : forall d : preDTA, lower_fix_point bool (ensemble_base state d) lem (dta_app_ne d) (dta_non_empty_states d)
pl_path_recon_true : forall (d : preDTA) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_true plp (dta_non_empty_states d)
semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
dt_kill_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (s s' : state), states_kill m s = Some s' -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet state (preDTA_kill m d) a = Some s'
sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
dt_kill_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (preDTA_kill m d) a = Some s -> exists s' : state, MapGet state d a = Some s' /\ states_kill m s' = Some s
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0
dt_non_empty_def_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
st_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
term_occur_1 : forall (t : term_list) (u : term), term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
essence = fun (t : term) (d : preDTA) => S (term_high t) * S (DTA_taille d) : term -> preDTA -> nat
dta_app_ne_def_ok : forall d : preDTA, def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne d)
pl_tl_length_rec_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d la tl -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_rec_length_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_rec_length_def d la tl -> liste_rec_length_def d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)

``` 
intros d a t H.
inversion H; subst.
apply rec_dta with ladj.
- assumption.
- apply state_reconnait with ladj.
  + assumption.
  + assumption.
```

original: intros d a t H. inversion H; subst. apply rec_dta with ladj. - auto. - apply state_reconnait with ladj. + auto. + auto.
